mapper.select: select AGENTS_ID , MAIN_TYPE_CODE,MINOR_TYPE_CODE, YEAR_OF_START, MONTH_OF_START , count(order_Bill_Id) ORDER_COUNT , sum(total_Adult) TOTAL_ADULT,sum(total_Child)TOTAL_CHILD , sum(order_Amount)ORDER_AMOUNT , sum(SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT)SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT,sum(UNPAID_AMOUNT)UNPAID_AMOUNT,sum(PAID_AMOUNT)PAID_AMOUNT from AGENTS_PAYMENT_FACT where AGENTS_ID=#{agentsId} and YEAR_OF_START = #{year} group by MINOR_TYPE_CODE ,YEAR_OF_START ,MONTH_OF_START,MAIN_TYPE_CODE;

select AGENTS_ID , MAIN_TYPE_CODE,MINOR_TYPE_CODE, YEAR_OF_START, MONTH_OF_START , count(order_Bill_Id) ORDER_COUNT , sum(total_Adult) TOTAL_ADULT,sum(total_Child)TOTAL_CHILD , sum(order_Amount)ORDER_AMOUNT , sum(SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT)SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT,sum(UNPAID_AMOUNT)UNPAID_AMOUNT,sum(PAID_AMOUNT)PAID_AMOUNT from AGENTS_PAYMENT_FACT where AGENTS_ID=#{agentsId} and YEAR_OF_START = #{year} group by MINOR_TYPE_CODE ,YEAR_OF_START , MAIN_TYPE_CODE;

distinct
from AGENTS_PAYMENT_FACT
order by ${orderByClause}
